{
  "title": "Chicken Alfredo Recipe",
  "serving_size": 4,
  "ingredients": {
    "Chicken": "SUBSTITUTED with Chicken Wings",
    "Parsley": true,
    "Garlic": true,
    "Butter": true,
    "Parmesan": true,
    "White Rice": true,
    "Heavy Cream": true,
    "Table Salt": true,
    "Pepper": true
  },
  "instructions": [
    "Cook the white rice according to package instructions.",
    "In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat.",
    "Add minced garlic and chopped parsley to the skillet and cook until fragrant.",
    "Season the chicken wings with salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet.",
    "Cook the chicken wings until they are browned and cooked through.",
    "Reduce heat and pour in heavy cream, stirring constantly.",
    "Add grated Parmesan cheese and continue stirring until the sauce thickens.",
    "Serve the Alfredo sauce over white rice and garnish with additional Parmesan and parsley."
  ]
}
